# Object

The object of this body is to fulfill the requirements for the Presbytery as set forth in the [Book of Church Order of Evangel Presbytery](https://evangel.pressbooks.com) ([BCO 15.8](https://evangel.pressbooks.com/chapter/15-the-presbytery/); hereafter, *"Book of Church Order"* or *"BCO"*). The doctrinal and governmental standards of this Presbytery shall be those stated in the Book of Church Order (Preface, C). These Bylaws are not to conflict with the Book of Church Order, and in any case of conflict, the standards of the Book of Church Order shall take precedence.
